verses.verse: Do not be <S%H7065>envious<s%> of <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H408>Nor<s%> <S%H183>desire<s%> to be with them;
For their <S%H3820>minds<s%> <S%H1897>devise<s%> <S%H7701>violence,<s%> And their <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> of <S%H5999>trouble.<s%>
By <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H1129>built,<s%> And by <S%H8394>understanding<s%> it is <S%H3559>established;<s%>
And by <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> the <S%H2315>rooms<s%> are <S%H4390>filled<s%> With <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3368>precious<s%> and <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> <S%H1952>riches.<s%>
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> is <S%H5797>strong,<s%> And a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H553>increases<s%> <S%H3581>power.<s%>
For by <S%H8458>wise<s%> <S%H8458>guidance<s%> you will <S%H6213>wage<s%> <S%H4421>war,<s%> And in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H3289>counselors<s%> there is <S%H8668>victory.<s%>
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is too <S%H7311>high<s%> for a <S%H191>fool,<s%> He does not <S%H6605>open<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>
He who <S%H2803>plans<s%> to <S%H7489>do<s%> <S%H7489>evil,<s%> Men will <S%H7121>call<s%> him a <S%H1167>schemer.<s%> <S%H4209><s%>
The <S%H2154>devising<s%> of <S%H200>folly<s%> is <S%H9128>sin,<s%> And the <S%H9238>scoffer<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H120>men.<s%>
If you are <S%H7503>slack<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>distress,<s%> Your <S%H3581>strength<s%> is <S%H9495>limited.<s%>

<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> those who are being <S%H3947>taken<s%> away to <S%H4194>death,<s%> And those who are <S%H4131>staggering<s%> to <S%H2027>slaughter,<s%> <S%H518>O<s%> <S%H2820>hold<s%> [them] <S%H2820>back.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2005>"See,<s%> we did not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%>" Does He not <S%H995>consider<s%> [it] who <S%H8505>weighs<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%>? And does He not <S%H3045>know<s%> [it] who <S%H5341>keeps<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%>? And will He not <S%H7725>render<s%> to <S%H120>man<s%> according to his <S%H6467>work<s%>?
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1706>honey,<s%> for it is <S%H2896>good,<s%> Yes, the <S%H5317>honey<s%> from the <S%H5317>comb<s%> is <S%H4966>sweet<s%> to your <S%H2441>taste;<s%>

<S%H3045>Know<s%> [that] <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H3651>thus<s%> for your <S%H5315>soul;<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H4672>find<s%> [it,] then <S%H3426>there<s%> will be a <S%H319>future,<s%> And your <S%H8615>hope<s%> will not be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%>

Do not <S%H693>lie<s%> in <S%H693>wait,<s%> O <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man,<s%> against the <S%H5116>dwelling<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> Do not <S%H7703>destroy<s%> his <S%H7258>resting<s%> <S%H7258>place;<s%>

For a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7651>times,<s%> and <S%H6965>rises<s%> again, But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in [time of] <S%H9567>calamity.<s%>
Do not <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> when your <S%H340>enemy<s%> <S%H5307>falls,<s%> And do not let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H1523>glad<s%> when he <S%H3782>stumbles;<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> [it] and be <S%H7489>displeased,<s%> <S%H5869><s%> And He <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> His <S%H639>anger<s%> from him.
Do not <S%H2734>fret<s%> because of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> Or be <S%H7065>envious<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%>
For there will be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H319>future<s%> for the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7451>man;<s%> The <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will be <S%H1846>put<s%> out.
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and the <S%H4428>king;<s%> Do not <S%H6148>associate<s%> with those who are <S%H8132>given<s%> to <S%H8132>change;<s%>
For their <S%H343>calamity<s%> will <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly,<s%> And <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H6365>ruin<s%> [that comes] from <S%H8147>both<s%> of them?
<S%H428>These<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> are sayings of the <S%H2450>wise.<s%> To <S%H5234>show<s%> <S%H5234>partiality<s%> <S%H6440><s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is not <S%H2896>good.<s%>
He who <S%H559>says<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> "You are <S%H6662>righteous,<s%>" <S%H5971>Peoples<s%> will <S%H6895>curse<s%> him, <S%H3816>nations<s%> will <S%H2194>abhor<s%> him;
But to those who <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> the [wicked] will be <S%H5276>delight,<s%> And a <S%H9185>good<s%> <S%H1293>blessing<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> upon them.
He <S%H5401>kisses<s%> the <S%H8193>lips<s%> Who <S%H7725>gives<s%> a <S%H5228>right<s%> <S%H1697>answer.<s%>

<S%H3559>Prepare<s%> your <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%> And <S%H6257>make<s%> it <S%H6257>ready<s%> for yourself in the <S%H7704>field;<s%> <S%H310>Afterwards,<s%> then, <S%H1129>build<s%> your <S%H1004>house.<s%>
Do not be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> against your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause,<s%> And do not <S%H6601>deceive<s%> with your <S%H8193>lips.<s%>

<S%H6213>Do<s%> not <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3651>"Thus<s%> I shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to him as he has <S%H6213>done<s%> to me; I will <S%H7725>render<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H6467>work.<s%>"
I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by the <S%H7704>field<s%> of the <S%H6102>sluggard,<s%> And by the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2638>lacking<s%> <S%H3820>sense;<s%>

And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H3605>completely<s%> <S%H5927>overgrown<s%> with <S%H7057>thistles,<s%> Its <S%H6440>surface<s%> was <S%H3680>covered<s%> with <S%H2738>nettles,<s%> And its <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H1447>wall<s%> was <S%H2040>broken<s%> <S%H2040>down.<s%>
When I <S%H2372>saw,<s%> I <S%H7896>reflected<s%> <S%H3820><s%> upon it; I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> [and] <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H4148>instruction.<s%>
"A <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8572>slumber,<s%> A <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2264>folding<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7901>rest,<s%>"
Then your <S%H7389>poverty<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> [as] a <S%H1980>robber,<s%> And your <S%H4270>want<s%> like an <S%H4043>armed<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
